qas.question: When was the Oklahoma History Center created?
Who operates the Oklahoma History Center?
Where is the Oklahoma History Center located?

context: The Oklahoma History Center is the history museum of the state of Oklahoma. Located across the street from the governor's mansion at 800 Nazih Zuhdi Drive in <a2_0>northeast Oklahoma City<a2_0/>, the museum opened in <a0_0>2005<a0_0/> and is operated by the <a1_0>Oklahoma Historical Society<a1_0/>. It preserves the history of Oklahoma from the prehistoric to the present day.
